description: VM Pro Lab - Desarrollo Web Profesional

scripts.minify:html: html-minifier index.html -o dist/index.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css --minify-js && sed -i.bak 's|href="css/styles\.css"|href="css/styles.min.css"|g; s|src="js/main\.js"|src="js/main.min.js"|g' dist/index.html && rm dist/index.html.bak
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.copy:assets: npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:images
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify && npm run minify:html && npm run copy:assets

author: VM Pro Lab
